#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long 
#define f(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	string s;
	long double a,b,c;
	int n,f1=0,i;
	cin>>n;
	cin>>s;
	cin>>a>>b;
	c=a;
	for(i=1;i<n;i++)
	{
		if(s[i]!=s[i-1])
		c=a;
		else
		c+=a;
		if(c>b)
		{
			f1=1;
			break;
		}
	}
	if(f1==1)
	cout<<"NO\n";
	else
	cout<<"YES\n";
	return 0;
}
